initial_submission.description:
## **Overview**

![CSAT on Conversation](https://marketplace.dev.devrev-eng.ai/marketplace/api/item-artifact/don%3Acore%3Advrv-us-1%3Adevo%2F787%3Aartifact%2F40578)

The CSAT on Conversation snap-in offers a simplified approach to measure customer satisfaction level for the agent interaction. Valuable feedback from these surveys can be utilised by support agents and managers to enhance the overall customer experience.


## **Features**

### **Customized questions and response message**
During the installation of snap-in, the survey question that will be populated when the survey scale is displayed to the customer can be customized as per your requirements. Similarly, the survey response message to be displayed to the customer after they submit the survey can also be customized.

### **Simple survey response scale**
A simple built-in five-point survey response scale encourages higher customer response rate. Build better understanding of the customer satisfaction level with the agent interaction with higher number of responses.


## **Installation**

To enable CSAT, go to the DevRev Marketplace and select the survey snap-in. In DevRev, go to the **Configuration** tab on the snap-in. Specify the question to be asked to the customer and the response to be shown. Save the configuration and click **Next** to deploy the CSAT snap-in your environment.
